exceptions.tactic: intros a b c H1 H2.
intros a' b c H1 H2.
intros a' b' c H1 H2.
intros a' b' c' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference a3 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros. intros a b c H1 H2. unfold divp in *. destruct H1 as [a1 a2]. destruct H2 as [a3 a4]. unfold ppcp. unfold divp. simpl. exists (pX a1 b a3). unfold canonical. split. - rewrite <- H0. apply spminusf_extend; auto. - unfold canonical in a4. destruct a4. + exfalso. apply H. auto. + auto.
